db:abstract.db:para: Wraps the most important methods of Android Intent class.

db:para.db:emphasis: This class is under development and is subject to change.

db:abstract.db:para: This class was introduced in Qt 6.2.

db:para.db:emphasis: This class is under development and is subject to change.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QAndroidIntent is a convenience class that wraps the most important Android Intent methods.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QAndroidIntent::QAndroidIntent(const QString &action)
db:section.db:para: Creates a new intent and sets the provided action.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QAndroidIntent::QAndroidIntent(const int &intent)
db:section.db:para: Wraps the provided intent java object.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QAndroidIntent::QAndroidIntent(const int &packageContext, const char *className)
db:section.db:para: Creates a new intent and sets the provided packageContext and the service className. Example:

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QAndroidIntent::extraBytes(const QString &key)
db:section.db:para: Returns the extra key data from the Intent extras

db:section.db:title: QVariant QAndroidIntent::extraVariant(const QString &key)
db:section.db:para: Returns the extra key data from the Intent extras as a QVariant

db:section.db:title: int QAndroidIntent::handle() const
db:section.db:para: The return value is useful to call other Java API which are not covered by this wrapper

db:section.db:title: void QAndroidIntent::putExtra(const QString &key, const QByteArray &data)
db:section.db:para: Sets the key with the data in the Intent extras

db:section.db:title: void QAndroidIntent::putExtra(const QString &key, const QVariant &value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the key with the value in the Intent extras.
